Reviews.Content: Awesome system.  Works great.  Instructions leave a little to be desired though.  Definitely aqquality product I will say that. Overall i am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy

Reviews.Content: Been very happy with this product. It is easy to setup and enough options to fine tune it to your needs. Reviews.Author: james

Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and very user friendly. The picture is very clear - great resolution.  Very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it
Reviews.Author: tomi c.
Reviews.Content: We got the eight pack thinking we would only use six, and have two spares.  We wound up using all eight, and are wishing we had gotten two more.  The selling point was the quality of the video we are getting at present.  The neighborhood computer guru has them hooked up the my computer in another room which is really convenient by just pushing an icon on the desktop.  Good night vision, not a hundred ft. in total darkness, but with a little light, even from our solar lights, it is enough to see movement.  Will possibly expand in a few months if they hold up.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME FOR THE PRICE
Reviews.Author: alex Morales
Reviews.Content: CAMERAS WORK WELL IN ALL WEATHER LITTLE NOISY BUT THATS OK CAUSE IT KEEPS AN HONEST MAN IN CHECK.AND THIEVES AT BAY

Reviews.Title: DVR
Reviews.Author: Trish
Reviews.Content: Seems to work like it should . .but the mouse is hard to control . I'm using a pad underneath, too.

Reviews.Title: This is a nice system for the money you can't beat it!
Reviews.Author: Zachary Stewart
Reviews.Content: Got this installed which was super easy, cameras are pretty good quality and picture is clear for the price range, it's no HD but doesn't need to be. 1 of these cameras are in a very WET spot and is holding up great! The night vision is AMAZING! Works great and I will recommending this system in the future for sure!

Reviews.Title: Very good unit-Very poor instructions
Reviews.Author: lwb
Reviews.Content: The headline says it all. I installed the system without difficulty. However, I still have not been able to get the advertised "off site" viewing to function. I will continue to try.

Reviews.Title: Great System but a little user-unfriendly
Reviews.Author: qwerty
Reviews.Content: This package is a great little system -a lot of bang for the buck.  Resolution is great day or night and system has worked flawlessly since May 2013.  Lots of Pros, and only 2 cons:  1) Software interface is somewhat intuitive but product manuals are not the easiest to use....will require some trial and error and calls to customer service.  2)  Cameras can not be mounted from top....vertical-mount only.  This required me to engineer a solution using electrical boxes, some L-brackets, and some Seal-Tite, from Home Depot, which added about $7/camera.  Not a huge deal but would have been nice to avoid.  Would highly recommend based on functionality but deducted 1 star for the two cons described above.

Reviews.Title: I'm happy with this purchase.
Reviews.Author: Ben H.
Reviews.Content: The video quality is great and it was easy to set up. I do have a technical background, but for me, all it took was playing around with the DVR to figure out how everything works. Didn't have to read the manual. One thing is that two of the cameras motion sensors didn't work, or I would have given it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: they work great super sharp easy to install have a little problem with my router but got it fix now im in the internet i cant see all cameras in my android phone or tablet love the way cameras look quality is super im goin to purchase 4 more cameras for my sys

Reviews.Content: support service is non existant, they ask you to leave a message and they will get back to you in three days :( not acceptable.setting up the system was fairly easy the system is not bad, picture is not as crisp as I thought it would be but acceptable. my problem lies in the fact that setting up remote view is very complicated and so far impossible. Reviews.Title: Smart security...
Reviews.Author: Julia
Reviews.Content: My husband and I purchased this because we live surrounded by 6 acres of woods and you cannot see our house from the road or from the neighbors.  These are excellent.  Very easy to install, easy to position and re-position and good quality image.  These aren't the "super spy" cameras that you can drill down to a person's reticle, but they are nice quality and do the job more than credibly!

Reviews.Title: Product is great at a great price
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied with the product at this price.  I would buy again if I put in another system.  Customer support isn't all that great, but the how-to videos helped out.

Reviews.Title: night vision?

Reviews.Content: these cameras don't see at night, i mounted them within 20 feet of my vehicle and at night you can barely make out theres a truck in the picture I am still being vandalized

Reviews.Title: too cool for school
Reviews.Author: Melina
Reviews.Content: good product , great price. wish they made same model but wireless. got it used on here for 260.... might stick with it

Reviews.Title: Bought them 4 years ago and STILL running!!!

Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product 100 times over!! 5 years ago I bought Wilife surveillance system by Logitech and it was complete GARBAGE!! I replaced them with the Defender 8 camera surveillance system and to date it is still up and running with clear resolution. You can watch the cameras remotely through an internet connection also.The cameras have lasted through storms Irene of 2011 and Sandy of 2012. DEFINTIELY WORTH THE $$$$A dvd backup system would have been brilliant for this product, but there are so many options on the internet you don't need rely on a dedicated dvd system.

Reviews.Author: Doug

Reviews.Title: Great low end unit

Reviews.Content: This unit was easy to install, plug and play.Camera resolution isn't the best but, is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good security system
Reviews.Author: Singularity
Reviews.Content: Good security system you can view the camera feed remotely or off site at another location. The video quality is okay, not the best. However it does it's job.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality Easy to Install.
Reviews.Author: Mario Garcia
Reviews.Content: These cameras are very easy to install. I did not even used the instructions because everything is pretty much plug and play. The only suggestion I have for the company is to make the connectors smaller. I installed these cameras in a Law Firm and I had to drill holes through some thick walls. You need a 5/8 drill bit. I actually used a smaller one to start the hole and then used the 5/8. I did the port forwarding to allow remote viewing on the computer browser and mobile phone. The quality is great. Even at night time you can see very clear. I don't think is nowhere near 100 feet but it lets you see.

Reviews.Title: great system for the homeowner
Reviews.Author: Anthony Brown
Reviews.Content: I purchased this system a little more than a month ago, and have had no problems so far.  I was able to get it hooked up to the internet and have been able to watch video from my android phone very easily.The cameras provide a great live video that is very clear.  The playback of the video could be a little better, but it is still great for the price. For the price of this system including 8 cameras, the value is incredible.  My only issue came when I ran the video cables backwards.  They aren't like data cables where the ends don't matter. Sure, the video cable is fine, but the power cable has a male and female side. Pay attention to which end goes to the camera, and which goes to the dvr.

Reviews.Title: Good piece of mind
Reviews.Author: MN Parent
Reviews.Content: This is a good product for the money, and gives you a piece of mind. Wish I would have bought it before i got broke into.

Reviews.Title: 21050 DVR camera surveillance system
Reviews.Author: preston harrison
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased a Defender 21050 16 ch system. I have owned an older system SN301 for about 2 years that works flawlessly to monitor a home in the mountains. Reviews.Title: So far great

Reviews.Content: Bought this about a month ago and installed, cameras are great, install was fairly easy, definitely takes planning, the dvr is not as user friendly as i had hoped but it works

Reviews.Title: Great Camera's for the Price
Reviews.Author: William Elwell
Reviews.Content: This is a great package for a business or home.  System is easy to set-up and use and works great.

Reviews.Title: Totally recommend this system!

Reviews.Content: Have used a wireless system in the past but had a plethora of interference and connection issues. Did a lot of research and settled on this Defender system, which is awesome! Reviews.Content: I bought this system as it was described as the one to get since I use Macs. However, some of the software-related features are specific only to Windows. The quality otherwise is very good, though not great. If you are a Mac user, thinking that everything about this pertains to Macs, be aware that that is not the case.Michael Hughes

Reviews.Title: Appears like great system
Reviews.Author: Nathan Binkley
Reviews.Content: I have not got to hook the entire system up but have tinkered with it. the camera quality and gui for the dvr are good quality. will update more as i hook up system.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Julie T Foret
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to follow up on many of the above ratings, the email feature on the DVR absolutely works.  I did not need to contact the manufacturer for support, the system is somewhat intuative if you can follow along with the menus.  I would suggest adjusting your settings and making system sdjustments via your PC rather than trying to navigate the DVR directly, the software provided, once you connect the DVR to your network, works extremely good.

Reviews.Title: Defender
Reviews.Author: Rio
Reviews.Content: Excellent choice for home security system. 600res cameras a must for any system. The 8 cameras allowed me to secure thr entire house. Installation just as easy as installing a vcr.

Reviews.Title: Great Price Great System
Reviews.Author: Tristin West
Reviews.Content: This system works wonderfully. It includes everything that is needed and was very easy to install. I like it so much, I bought another.

Reviews.Title: Very nice surveillance system for the money
Reviews.Author: BobHam
Reviews.Content: Have had this system for a little over a month now.  The DVR has ample features, allowing the owner to record by time, days of the week, or on-screen motion.  It even allows you to send an email to yourself with a photo of any motion it sees.  Installation was simple at my home using the 75' cables through my attic, but I suggest finding a location for the DVR near the center of the house to insure the cable can reach all directions.  I am able to access and re-program my DVR remotely from any internet-connected computer, and the mobile app is great, letting me view live video of any camera.  After buying this system I purchased 4 additional cameras from Defender to fill out the 8 channel DVR inputs, and to provide total coverage.  I don't think you can go wrong buying this system.

Reviews.Title: Good system
Reviews.Author: Jerrell Boykin
Reviews.Content: I recently installed the system and my first impression was how easy it was to setup. I especially like the email feature. The resolution of the cameras is real clear. I would recommend this product to someone.

Reviews.Title: Great product/DVR Software
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: First the DVR is surprisingly small.  Slightly bigger than a net-book.  The DVRs software is highly configurable.  However I suggest you read through the manual for setting up motion alarm and mobile access.  The user interface while not difficult to understand is not exactly intuitive either.  The cameras are great.  The resolution on these was why I bought the system.Overall great product and already recommended this to friends.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Customer Support
Reviews.Author: XxICARUSxX
Reviews.Content: Product is packaged neatly with very straight forward installation instructions. After spending a day or two installing cameras and running wires everything was setup and secure. Getting this to work with your iPhone will require some ingenuity. I began running into issues unblocking ports but the live chat support walked me through the entire process. Getting it to work properly took a while, but they helped me through any questions I had. Great product and the ability to see your cameras on your mobile phone is just awesome. Top notch customer service, very patient and helpful.

Reviews.Title: Defender Security
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: Very easy to setup and configure.  It's awesome to be able to monitor my home from my Android phone.  I don't know how I ever lived without it!

Reviews.Title: Not a 21030 DVR  package
Reviews.Author: weis "weis"
Reviews.Content: Promptly delivered package marked 21030  Package actually contained an SN-301 DVR which according to the Defender website has somewhat less capability than the 21030 DVR.  Product immediately returned for refund.I view this as a notable exception to the usually excellent Amazon description and pricing experience.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very easy install and works great. This is far better quality than I was expecting. Great coverage for our store.

Reviews.Title: Good for price
Reviews.Author: kyle wilson
Reviews.Content: The price was decent. Installed myself and set up. Within the first year i lost 4 of the 8 cameras even with them being in sheltered areas.

Reviews.Title: it works fine for, very easy to setup

Reviews.Content: it works fine for, very easy to setup. my only problem is that two hours later i saw it for $80.00 less

Reviews.Title: Night vision Poor
Reviews.Author: mallen
Reviews.Content: I purchased this so I could protect my property at night. I was disappointed after about three months when the night vision dissipated to no vision.

Reviews.Title: Nice system
Reviews.Author: J. Wyatt
Reviews.Content: I installed this in 3hrs. This is a easy system to install and came with premade cables. The cameras are nice and easy to mount. the software works well. Used my iphone to view.

Reviews.Title: Sounds great but not really...
Reviews.Author: Alpha_Eleven
Reviews.Content: First of all, it is painful to install these things.  Not the fault of the product itself but be aware.  My real complaint is that the picture quality just isn't all that good.  If you are looking for just the basic shape, this might do.  For real identification from more than 10 ft away, this simply won't cut it.

Reviews.Title: No thanks
Reviews.Author: the grouch
Reviews.Content: Ok system but not as good as cheaper ones i have played with. States that it will hold info for 30 days. Maybe for 1 camera but not 8 cameras. That was one of the reasons I purchased this system because it said it will hold video up to 30 days. I already had a camera burn out in less then 6 months. Not fun having to take down, and remount. would not reccomend this unit. The cameras are better the the little white sony's as far as picture is concerned but that is all I can say about it.

Reviews.Title: So far, So good
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: So far, the Defender has done well.  During the day, we get really nice, clear shots all around the house.  At dusk, or on overcast days, it switches to infrared.  I have not set up recording yet, but it does work.  It is possible to set up recording times and which cameras actually record.  Very handy!  Like many newer electronics, it does much more than what I've had time to figure out.  We just want to catch the bears that regularly get in to our garbage.  I'm very pleased with all of the options provided and do plan to buy the additional cameras available.  this model comes with 4 cameras and is expandable to 8.  This unit seems to be the most bang for the buck with the best performance in this entry level price range.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras, good service but weak DVR playback functions
Reviews.Author: Amy Tsuneishi "Amy T"
Reviews.Content: Updated 5/21/13 - I received a call from the Defender customer service department on a work around. The instructions provided was not clear on this so I will explain for future customers here. I haven't tried this yet and will do so tonight.DVR: Systems - Users section - this is where you will find you admin section of internal/external logins through web browsers and on the DVR. The main Admin account is noted here. Changing and adding users and passwords only changes your login when accessing through PC/Mac systems or via the DVR this does not change the Mobile access when using a phone or tablet device and 3rd party apps.DVR: Network - Mobile - Users - this is where the customer service rep noted we must go to change and add users for mobile access. The users added here are for the access via apps like ASee, IP Cam Viewer Lite, etc.The max user issue could be from the use of multiple devices on the same login.Original review below:Hi I finally installed my cameras from my purchase last year and was successfully able to port forward and view external/internal IP address. The way the system works remotely can be difficult esp for people who are not IT people. I am able to get the Safari to work on my mac with a program install to view the cameras internally. This interface is great. However; on the IE of a Windows 8 PC I am still unable to get the active X to install the necessary software because it says not signed signature so Windows continues to block it even when I have changed my security settings in IE. You cannot use any other browsers to view them remotely.My major issue is the max user message where I am unable to view many of the channels if I have different devices using the same login through various 3rd party apps even though none of the devices use them simultaneously (The app that works best is with ASee for the Iphone/Ipad etc.) I am unable to get any of the users I created to work from the DVR hoping it would resolve the max user issue where camera feed is not displayed.I tried creating multiple users with passwords but none of the logins/passwords work even though I've reset and rebooted the DVR multiple times after I saved the new user data. It's even showing in the system but none of them work.My second issue is with the admin login, I am unable to change from the default password, the system doesn't like it nor do the passwords I changed work when I tried using them and logging in remotely to view.Any assistance from their tech support would be appreciated would be greatly appreciated. I bought this last summer but have not found any firmware to update. Their contact links on their website were not working when I sent the request it just says page not found after I hit send. The "network" sections of their website from the instructions do not exist anymore and I am unable to use that for any other help.The only good thing about this kit is the cameras are pretty decent and good at night. the drawback is the noisy IR filters which constantly turns on and off.I think the only other minor issue is the software is a bit glitchy and not that user friendly especially with the playback interface. Although the remote login from a PC/MAC is not too bad.I have mine set to  motion and am not easily able to find the motion detection events and recordings I set in place remotely and is only slightly easier when you actually go to the DVR to look.The lens are also not that wide in range as well and I may have to switch out a few for different cameras in the low 3mm range that offers a wider area of coverage IE front of the house, front door etc.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding system.
Reviews.Author: Kate Stokes
Reviews.Content: I couldn't imagine a better way to design a consumer grade DVR security system. Everything is made with great care and fine materials, everything works great and everything is super easy to set up. I imagine that a good part of the effectiveness comes from the deterrent value, and these cameras certainly look like they mean business. Having a whopping 8 cameras means getting every possible angle, too. Most buyers will probably want to hire a handyman or security system installer since the drilling of holes in your business/house is required, so keep that in mind. This is an outstanding turnkey security solution for homes and small businesses. If you have a home or small business and want to wire it for video security I could not recommend this product more.

Reviews.Title: DEFENDER 21027 SENTINEL security system
Reviews.Author: CJ. Stanek "Creative"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get my husband to write this review, but being I am the vine member it should be me who writes it, though I did not put this system up, I was there for the whole installation and I did hand over things as he needed them...lol as this is not necessarily something that just anyone could install, but I am SURE there are many women who COULD install this from beginning to end, I am just not one who has that kind of talent, and I hate ladders. If my computer and handy husband wouldn't of been around then I would of had to hired this out to be installed. This is the first time we have owned a security system, and still do not feel the great need for one, EXCEPT when gone on vacations...long or short ones, things can and do happen. Now I can rest assure that things are being watched day and night with this being installed. It takes a bit of thinking to decide WHERE to place the cameras, so keep that in mind, you might not get this installed in an hour is what I am saying, don't rush it, if you don't have the time, wait until you do. When you plan it out keep in mind they need to be in range of the receiver, so do some cable measuring and planning first. The software was an easy install. The security system comes with everything you will need to set it up, except of course you'll need to hook it up to your TV or your computer. The resolution is really good, of course I have nothing to compare it to being this is a first at our home, but we are both very pleased with the quality of the product and the ease of installation and the quality of the resolution...if it isn't good and you can't make out faces clearly...why have it, right? Oh, another feature I thought was a good one is the way it is mounted, the cable goes from the camera right through the mount piece and into the wall, so there is no way someone is going to cut the cable, they could yank the whole thing down I suppose, but I doubt that they are going to take that kind of time to find a way up to it to pull it down etc., usually thieves want easy in and a fast out!  Oh...ONE more thing, they offer lifetime support.

Reviews.Title: A Quick Thought...
Reviews.Author: S. Beck "mysticalley"
Reviews.Content: 1-11-3GO WIRELESS !!-------I received this item in record time.  We have a few buildings on our property and, living in the country, we have animals roaming at all hours of the night.  I was so looking forward to setting this up.  When it arrived I unpacked and it began reading instructions.  Suffice to say, I haven't set up yet.  The contruction and parts appear well made and all the items are there - the problem is placement.  I can only say that as soon as I have someone to place the cameras - I will follow through with additional comments regarding the functions and the operation.The trouble - it's involved and it has wires.  The cameras are not capable of wireless transmission and thus my issue.  I have to centrally locate the DVR so I can strategically place the cameras from one end of the house to the other - a generous 90 ft from one end to the other.  Each wire is 65ft. but rather than rush into it, I have to consider all the options.  With Vine we must continue to leave ratings and therefore I'm starting with these initial thoughts.  I anticipate operations commencing within the next week and will update accordingly.For right now - it appears to be a very well made product but slightly involved.  Wires will be the main issue for us.  Will keep you posted!

Reviews.Title: Good choice for us
Reviews.Author: Bob and Gloria Nelson
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with what another reviewer, Wayne, said about this product. It is easy to set up right out of the boxes. We ordered the system through Defender's website and received it about 10 days later.It really helps if you take the time to plan exactly where you are going to put the cameras and then make sure they all work before you mount them. We labeled all of the cables prior to running them so they would be plugged into the correct place.We are using IE8 (haven't gotten to IE9 yet). After making the adjustments in the Internet options as outlined in the small manual included, we had no difficulty viewing the cameras on our network. I can't offer anything about remote viewing at this time. However I have noted that if you are not at least a little computer savvy, you might have some difficulty. The manual provided on the disc is much clearer and more extensive than the hard copy provided. We took it to Kinko's and made a copy of it. The recording times were also easy to set up. The default is for them to record all the time.The cameras provide a good clear view and yes, you can only mount them on a wall. We were also pleased with the night vision, and I understand that if you have low voltage lighting placed some 15 to 20 feet from the camera, you will be able to see much further at night.The only thing we were disappointed about is the sequence viewing. We have a 15-inch monitor connected by VGA cable to the DVR (if you use a VGA cable instead of an RCA cable, you must press "0" on the remote to be able to use the mouse. This changes the "mode"). You can view all eight cameras, or two quad views (either cameras 1-4 or cameras 5-8) or the entire sequence of all eight, the two quad views and finally each camera in a full screen view. Depending on the monitor you choose, very little detail can be seen in the 8-camera view. We had hoped to see a selection for each camera in a full screen view and nothing additional.Apparently, Defender did not receive the review that we posted on their website, and said we could leave a review here as well. (If you order through their website, you will see ads for Defender on every web page you visit until you delete the cookie.)
